divs: Sighting DetailsTwo of my friends were sleeping at a freinds house in his back garden inside his sisters small wooden house.It was between 5 and 6 in the morning and the weather was clear,little cloud and no sunshine nor rain.we were all asleep when i heard a rumbling noise and the ground was shakeing,the noise was comeing from the sky and was getting closer.We all rushed outside and looked into the sky and it took only a second or two to c where and what the noise was.I Looked up and sore a cigar shaped u.f.o.It was chrome and had no windows and no wings,it was just motionless and no noise watsoever.it was approx 50ft from the ground and approx 60 to 70ft in diameter.We all staired at it for about 15 seconds when i for some reason decided to run down the garden,down the steps through the gate,down the drive abit,jumped over the drive gates onto the main road.I looked up and it had gone without no noise,i didnt c it go nor were there any cars or people.i still carnt understand y i ran to the road because were i was was a perfect view point and from the road the view wouldnt of been so good.i whent back to the rear garden to where my friends was.my mind was from there on,i carnt remember what we talked about or anything.I can remember some time later keep asking just one of my friends about it but he never talked about it,he never rejected it or denied seeing just changed the subdject.some years later i was parralised in bed,i couldnt move any part of my body apart from my one of my feet,its never happend since.
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around April 5th 1997
Summary: 3 of my freinds sore a cigar shaped ufo in daylight 50ft above our heads,it was stood stil,motionless.
